legacy.full_text: RT @ChinaAmbUN: You have our full support @antonioguterres.

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations. See also https://t.co/gGUiTCoPqT
legacy.name: Zhang Jun

legacy.description:
Secretary-General of the @UN.

We will never, ever give up making this world better for everyone, everywhere.
legacy.name: António Guterres

legacy.full_text:
The way forward is clear:

Humanitarian ceasefire.
Respect for int'l humanitarian law.

Unconditional release of hostages.

Protection of civilians, hospitals, UN facilities, shelters & schools.

Ending use of civilians as human shields.
More humanitarian aid entering Gaza.

NOW. https://t.co/pgYxCCf2C9
You have our full support @antonioguterres.

legacy.description: 中华人民共和国常驻禁止化学武器组织代表团

legacy.full_text: RT @ChinaAmbUN: The humanitarian situation on the ground in Gaza is deteriorating every minute. A ceasefire must be in place immediately wi…

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations. See also https://t.co/gGUiTCoPqT
legacy.name: Zhang Jun

legacy.description:
Secretary-General of the @UN.

We will never, ever give up making this world better for everyone, everywhere.
legacy.name: António Guterres

legacy.full_text:
The protection of civilians is paramount.

The Laws of War establish clear rules to protect human life and respect humanitarian concerns.

Those laws cannot be contorted for the sake of expedience.
The humanitarian situation on the ground in Gaza is deteriorating every minute. A ceasefire must be in place immediately without any delay!!!

legacy.full_text:
针对台湾当局近期炒作所谓“参与联合国诉求”、曲解联大第2758号决议等行为，中国常驻联合国代表张军大使发表谈话，阐明严正立场。全文如下：

https://t.co/AcWTrDGddF
我正告民进党当局和部分外部势力：联大第2758号决议不容曲解，一个中国原则不容侵犯！

legacy.full_text: We don’t want August 24, 2023—the day announced by Japan for the start of ocean discharge of Fukushima nuclear-contaminated water—to be a disaster day for marine environment. If Japan does not change course, it must bear the historic responsibility for this decision. https://t.co/uM2J3ezyGo

legacy.description:

legacy.full_text: The ocean sustains humanity. It is not a sewer for Japan’s nuclear-contaminated water. China urges Japan to cancel the plan, communicate with its neighbors with sincerity and good will, dispose of the water responsibly and agree to international oversight. https://t.co/jKeiSOhTG5

value.string_value: In ACCIONA we have launched a pilot project that uses a game as a learning method.The aim is for employees to get acquainted with our competency model and the meaning of each competency – and you...
Learning through play is not just for kids

legacy.full_text: We have launched a pilot project that uses a game as a learning method.The aim is for employees to get acquainted with our competency model and the meaning of each competency – and you could say that it’s child’s play! Learn more 🧐👀 #PeopleACCIONA https://t.co/JuKB2PVTQO

tags.name: Permanent Mission of China in Vienna
Permanent Mission of China in Vienna

legacy.full_text:
China’s possession of nuclear weapons is not aimed at seeking hegemony, but deterring nuclear war. China has never used nuclear weapons to intimidate and bully non-nuclear-weapon States.
Full remarks: 
https://t.co/m8k78J63Rd https://t.co/VAC3gMmumn

legacy.full_text: President Xi Jinping met with Solomon Islands’ PM Manasseh Sogavare. President Xi said China is ready to share with Solomon Islands the development opportunities brought by Chinese modernization & help the Solomon Islands achieve development, revitalization & long-term stability. https://t.co/xRBQW74TAy
